00033 #include "node_composite_util.h"
00034 
00035 /* **************** SCALAR MATH ******************** */ 
00036 static bNodeSocketTemplate cmp_node_math_in[]= { 
00037     { SOCK_FLOAT, 1, "Value", 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1.0f, -10000.0f, 10000.0f, PROP_NONE}, 
00038     { SOCK_FLOAT, 1, "Value", 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1.0f, -10000.0f, 10000.0f, PROP_NONE}, 
00039     { -1, 0, "" } 
00040 };
00041 
00042 static bNodeSocketTemplate cmp_node_math_out[]= { 
00043     { SOCK_FLOAT, 0, "Value"}, 
00044     { -1, 0, "" } 
00045 };
00046 
00047 static void do_math(bNode *node, float *out, float *in, float *in2)
00048 {
00049     switch(node->custom1)
00050     {
00051     case 0: /* Add */
00052         out[0]= in[0] + in2[0]; 
00053         break; 
00054     case 1: /* Subtract */
00055         out[0]= in[0] - in2[0];
00056         break; 
00057     case 2: /* Multiply */
00058         out[0]= in[0] * in2[0]; 
00059         break; 
00060     case 3: /* Divide */
00061         {
00062             if (in2[0]==0)  /* We don't want to divide by zero. */
00063                 out[0]= 0.0;
00064             else
00065                 out[0]= in[0] / in2[0];
00066             }
00067         break;
00068     case 4: /* Sine */
00069         out[0]= sin(in[0]);
00070         break;
00071     case 5: /* Cosine */
00072         out[0]= cos(in[0]);
00073         break;
00074     case 6: /* Tangent */
00075         out[0]= tan(in[0]);
00076         break;
00077     case 7: /* Arc-Sine */
00078         {
00079             /* Can't do the impossible... */
00080             if (in[0] <= 1 && in[0] >= -1 )
00081                 out[0]= asin(in[0]);
00082             else
00083                 out[0]= 0.0;
00084         }
00085         break;
00086     case 8: /* Arc-Cosine */
00087         {
00088             /* Can't do the impossible... */
00089             if ( in[0] <= 1 && in[0] >= -1 )
00090                 out[0]= acos(in[0]);
00091             else
00092                 out[0]= 0.0;
00093         }
00094         break;
00095     case 9: /* Arc-Tangent */
00096         out[0]= atan(in[0]);
00097         break;
00098     case 10: /* Power */
00099         {
00100             /* Only raise negative numbers by full integers */
00101             if ( in[0] >= 0 ) {
00102                 out[0]= pow(in[0], in2[0]);
00103             }
00104             else {
00105                 float y_mod_1 = fmod(in2[0], 1);
00106                 /* if input value is not nearly an integer, fall back to zero, nicer than straight rounding */
00107                 if (y_mod_1 > 0.999f || y_mod_1 < 0.001f) {
00108                     out[0]= powf(in[0], floorf(in2[0] + 0.5f));
00109                 }
00110                 else {
00111                     out[0] = 0.0f;
00112                 }
00113             }
00114         }
00115         break;
00116     case 11: /* Logarithm */
00117         {
00118             /* Don't want any imaginary numbers... */
00119             if ( in[0] > 0  && in2[0] > 0 )
00120                 out[0]= log(in[0]) / log(in2[0]);
00121             else
00122                 out[0]= 0.0;
00123         }
00124         break;
00125     case 12: /* Minimum */
00126         {
00127             if ( in[0] < in2[0] )
00128                 out[0]= in[0];
00129             else
00130                 out[0]= in2[0];
00131         }
00132         break;
00133     case 13: /* Maximum */
00134         {
00135             if ( in[0] > in2[0] )
00136                 out[0]= in[0];
00137             else
00138                 out[0]= in2[0];
00139         }
00140         break;
00141     case 14: /* Round */
00142         {
00143             /* round by the second value */
00144             if ( in2[0] != 0.0f )
00145                 out[0]= floorf(in[0] / in2[0] + 0.5f) * in2[0];
00146             else
00147                 out[0]= floorf(in[0] + 0.5f);
00148         }
00149         break;
00150     case 15: /* Less Than */
00151         {
00152             if ( in[0] < in2[0] )
00153                 out[0]= 1.0f;
00154             else
00155                 out[0]= 0.0f;
00156         }
00157         break;
00158     case 16: /* Greater Than */
00159         {
00160             if ( in[0] > in2[0] )
00161                 out[0]= 1.0f;
00162             else
00163                 out[0]= 0.0f;
00164         }
00165         break;
00166     }
00167 }
00168 
00169 static void node_composit_exec_math(void *UNUSED(data), bNode *node, bNodeStack **in, bNodeStack **out)
00170 {
00171     CompBuf *cbuf=in[0]->data;
00172     CompBuf *cbuf2=in[1]->data;
00173     CompBuf *stackbuf; 
00174 
00175     /* check for inputs and outputs for early out*/
00176     if (out[0]->hasoutput==0) return;
00177 
00178     /* no image-color operation */
00179     if (in[0]->data==NULL && in[1]->data==NULL) {
00180         do_math(node, out[0]->vec, in[0]->vec, in[1]->vec);
00181         return;
00182     }
00183 
00184     /*create output based on first input */
00185     if (cbuf) {
00186         stackbuf=alloc_compbuf(cbuf->x, cbuf->y, CB_VAL, 1);
00187     }
00188     /* and if it doesn't exist use the second input since we 
00189      know that one of them must exist at this point*/
00190     else {
00191         stackbuf=alloc_compbuf(cbuf2->x, cbuf2->y, CB_VAL, 1);
00192     }
00193 
00194     /* operate in case there's valid size */
00195     composit2_pixel_processor(node, stackbuf, in[0]->data, in[0]->vec, in[1]->data, in[1]->vec, do_math, CB_VAL, CB_VAL);
00196     out[0]->data= stackbuf;
00197 }
00198 
00199 void register_node_type_cmp_math(bNodeTreeType *ttype)
00200 {
00201     static bNodeType ntype;
00202 
00203     node_type_base(ttype, &ntype, CMP_NODE_MATH, "Math", NODE_CLASS_CONVERTOR, NODE_OPTIONS);
00204     node_type_socket_templates(&ntype, cmp_node_math_in, cmp_node_math_out);
00205     node_type_size(&ntype, 120, 110, 160);
00206     node_type_label(&ntype, node_math_label);
00207     node_type_exec(&ntype, node_composit_exec_math);
00208 
00209     nodeRegisterType(ttype, &ntype);
00210 }
